name: Portal Fantasy
storyline:
It has been 1000 years since the War of the Goddesses - Ravenna is dead, and the Pyli Kingdom has become prosperous once again. Or so it seems. As a novice at the prestigious Porble Academy, life takes an unexpected twist when you arrive late in Valeria, the capital.

Assigned trivial tasks by an unassuming assistant, little do you know that this journey will take you into something more sinister. Mysterious organizations, corrupted Porbles, and an ancient adversary await. Across Pyli Kingdom's diverse realms, you'll uncover a darker history than legends tell.

Get ready for an epic adventure. Each step peels away deeper mysteries, and each revelation inches you closer to the truth. The burning question: will you survive the lurking secrets?
summary:
Portal Fantasy is a quest builder and creature-capturing RPG. Explore the mysteries of Pyli Kingdom's turmoil 1000 years after the War of the Goddesses. As a Hero, tame Porbles and unravel kingdom mysteries, or as an Architect, craft unique worlds for other players. Engage in strategic turn-based battles, leveraging Porbles' skills and abilities, team up in co-op mode, play PvP duels, or design challenging adventures. Save the Pyli Kingdom in this epic journey through a thrilling, magical realm.

Embark on an unforgettable journey as a Hero in our immersive Story Campaign. Journey across vast lands, mingle with its intriguing denizens, crack enigmatic quests, and amass your mighty Porble squad. The Pyli Kingdom needs you!

Enter the strategic world of turn-based battles! Unlock Wilderness areas to battle and collect Porbles from 6 different elements with over 50 skills and 60 passive abilities. Conquer Baddies, fuse potent ingredients, and transform your Porbles into ultimate powerhouses. The battle is on!

Become the ultimate games master as an Architect. Combine hundreds of tiles, NPCs, traps and cosmetics with our dynamic map editor to unleash a world of infinite possibilities. Design, challenge, trap and revel as adventurers brave your world!

Team up with friends or forge fresh alliances! Dive into dynamic co-op quests, brace for heart-pounding PvP duels, and chat and cheer as players navigate your Architect masterpieces.
